#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
int test,n,array[100001]={0},i,j,count,maxcount,number;
scanf("%d",&test);
do
{
maxcount=0;
scanf("%d",&n);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
scanf("%d",&array[i]);
 
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
count=0;
for(j=0;j<n;j++)
{
if(array[i]==array[j])
count++;
}
if(count>maxcount)
{
maxcount=count;
number=array[i];
}
else
if(count==maxcount)
{
if(array[i]<number)
number=array[i];
}
}
printf("%d %d\n",number,maxcount);
test--;
}while(test!=0);
return 0;
}
